CustomField.description: Check if gap exists between the contract scope and the condition scope (BU, Products, Dates).
CustomField.formula: If( AND(Negoptim__Product_Scope__c = Negoptim__Contract__r.Negoptim__Supplier_Nego_Scope__c, Negoptim__BU_Scope__c = Negoptim__Contract__r.Negoptim__Contract_BU__c, Negoptim__Disc_BDate__c = Negoptim__Contract__r.Negoptim__Contract_BDate__c, Negoptim__Disc_EDate__c = Negoptim__Contract__r.Negoptim__Contract_EDate__c, OR(Negoptim__unit_amount__c = 0, AND(Negoptim__unit_amount__c <> 0, OR(TEXT(Negoptim__Unit_Amount_Type__c) = 'Piece', TEXT(Negoptim__Unit_Amount_Type__c) = 'UC')))) , True, False)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Précise si la condition suit le scope du contrat ou un scope spécifique
CustomField.label: Respects Contract Scope
